channel.title: achievements on mysterium
channel.description: Recent content in achievements on mysterium

item.title: Discover the Ancient Demonic Scroll
item.description: Info Key Value Id 2215 Name Discover the Ancient Demonic Scroll Point 20 Description Discover the Ancient Demonic Scroll by the Stormed Citadel portal. Detail Discover the Ancient Demonic Scroll on the steps to the destroyed portal. Conditions(s) Discover the Ancient Demonic Scroll. Tips Spawns randomly after defeating Harnovog in Stormed Citadel

item.title: Raiders of the Exodor Tomb
item.description: Info Key Value Id 20030 Name Raiders of the Exodor Tomb Point 30 Description Defeated the tomb robbers in the Exodor Outskirts. Detail Defeated tomb robbers. Conditions(s) Defeated Bari on an island where dragons appear. Crystal Tor Rosema Tribe Residence Azart Base Defeated Robin on an island where BAMs appear.

item.title: Exodor goes BAM!
item.description: Info Key Value Id 20031 Name Exodor goes BAM! Point 30 Description Defeated a BAM in Exodor. Detail Defeated a BAM. Conditions(s) Defeat Defeat Geiran in Rogash’s Garden. Chance to spawn upon defeating Jewel Beetle in Rogash’s Garden Defeat Cordi on the Exodor Farmlands. Chance to spawn upon defeating Jewel Lizard at Beast Farm, Exodor Farmlands Defeat Rimu on the Exodor Farmlands.

item.title: Sisterly Love
item.description: Achievement info Key Value Id 155001 Name Sisterly Love Point 10 Description Completed “Sibling Rivalry.” Detail Completed “Sibling Rivalry.” Conditions(s) Complete “Sibling Rivalry”. Notable reward Title Family Mediator Quest info Key Value Id 155800 Name Sibling Rivalry Prerequisite A Tale of Two Tails Region Poporia Starting Location Pora Elinu Starting NPC Arin Summary You gave Arin’s draught to Rida, but her sister’s attempt at manipulation angered her.
